verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's personal attorney] [V: used] [ARG1: his Trump Organization email] [ARGM-TMP: while arranging to transfer money into an account] [ARGM-TMP: before he wired $ 130,000 to Stormy Daniels.</p] >

< p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's personal attorney] used his Trump Organization email while [V: arranging] [ARG1: to transfer money into an account] [ARGM-TMP: before he wired $ 130,000 to Stormy] Daniels.</p >

< p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's personal attorney] used his Trump Organization email while arranging to [V: transfer] [ARG1: money] [ARG2: into an account] before he wired $ 130,000 to Stormy Daniels.</p >

< p > President Donald Trump 's personal attorney used his Trump Organization email while arranging to transfer money into an account before [ARG0: he] [V: wired] [ARG1: $ 130,000] [ARG2: to Stormy] Daniels.</p >
